entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 34. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Becoming clear overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 34. Wind chill minus 38 this evening and minus 43 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 7:32 PM MST Tuesday 21 February 2023
